name: Soccer Sumos - Multiplayer party game!
description:
Tabletop multiplayer soccer for 1-4 players!
Are you ready to score and tackle?

Features
- Everybody can play
- One-button controls
- 1 vs 1 and 2 vs 2 matches
- Frantic multiplayer gameplay
- Guaranteed laughs with friends

From the makers of King of Opera!
